title: Drawing, "Eight Studies of Friezes and Candelabrum", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 181, 1026, ...fondo della candegliera oro candigliera stucco, capitelli e base oro pilastro stucco.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Recto: Eight studies of friezes and candelabrum. Verso: anatomical study of head and profile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Eight Studies of Friezes and Candelabrum", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2306.
